section.title: Windows Install:

ol.li: Run JalEdit.exe from the jaledit directory
(optional) Click Tools Menu -> Environment Options -> Programmer, Then Set the Programmer Executable Path

section.title: Linux Install

ol.li: Go to http://code.google.com/p/jallib/downloads/list, get the link location of the jallib-pack (.tar.gz file)
Login via ssh to your linux install
Go to the directory you wish to install JALv2
Download the package with: #wget [link location of the jallib-pack]
